text: The Ambassador of Malaysia to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is the head of Malaysia's diplomatic mission to North Korea. The position has the rank and status of an Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary and is based in the Embassy of Malaysia, Pyongyang. ==List of heads of mission== ===Ambassadors to North Korea=== {| class=wikitable ! AmbassadorHead of Mission – Embassy of Malaysia, Pyongyang ! Term start ! Term end |- | Md. Yusoff Md. Zain || 28 February 2004 || 28 January 2006 |- | Rahimi Harun || 11 August 2008 || 28 February 2011 |- | Mohamad Nizan Mohamad || 5 June 2015 || 6 March 2017North Korea declares Malaysia’s envoy persona non grata | Free Malaysia Today |} ==See also== * Malaysia–North Korea relations == References == North Korea Malaysia
title: List of ambassadors of Malaysia to North Korea
